amendment.description: An amendment numbered 10 printed in Part B of House Report 116-302 to direct OSHA to prioritize providing technical assistance and advice to employers throughout the first year of the Act to ensure businesses are in compliance.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 10 printed in Part B of House Report 116-302 to direct OSHA to prioritize providing technical assistance and advice to employers throughout the first year of the Act to ensure businesses are in compliance.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Delgado amendment (A010) Agreed to by recorded vote: 242 - 176 (Roll no. 640).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A010) offered by Mr. Delgado.
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Delgado amendment (A010) Agreed to by recorded vote: 242 - 176 (Roll no. 640).
